content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went to town to get an ice cream, on our way back around 9pm, i noticed something above the tree line, pulled over on a side road to watch it and when a flash of lightning you could make out a triangular shaped craft, that just seemed to be floating along, there were no marker lights we got back into the car and left, wasn't sure what it was the lights looked headlights on a car, then i thought i ain't no car, and its moving to slow for a plane or helicopter
content.summary: Noticed 2 lights above tree line on hwy 68

content.detailedDescription: Right after 9-11, at about 4:30-5 am, still dark out, but cool enough for us to sit outside on our back patio drinking coffee as husband is getting ready to leave for work in vegas. we both looked up at the same time (unexplainable, except we look at the stars often)and the lights of vegas provided an outline on the forward edge of a really huge, silent, boomerang shaped object directly over us. hard to determine the speed, but it was above us for several minutes before we lost it visually. the object we saw was transparent like a piece of clear window glass travelling across the sky from boulder dam towards los angeles. it was up there long enough for us to compare with each other what we were seeing. it was totally clear but sort of distorted the stars enough that you could see the shape of it. we have never reported it or done anything about it but we still talk about the incident often. neither of us has ever heard about a transparent flying object before but we both know what we saw. of course, we just looked at each other and remarked that we had definitely just seen an unexplained flying object. since it was right after 9-11, it was pretty freaky trying to figure out what it was and why it was there in the first place. right after that happened, the military moved in and took over the hoover dam and closed it for security reasons. the ufo was freaky but the military rolling into boulder city to occupy the hoover dam was even freakier.
content.summary: Directly over us, huge, transparent but saw reflection of vegas city lights on front edge

content.detailedDescription:
Outside looking in an east direction towards i 95
noticed a glowing white/gold like disc/spear shape craft with a large circle, like a large orb beneath the craft.
the orb appear to be spinning in a counter-clockwise direction
and with a blue/grey color haze around the orb.
as the craft came closer in view the larger orb under the craft was releasing smaller white glowing orbs.
after approx. 2 minutes - 1 and 1/2 minute, i lost slight of the craft after it went behind tree line.
no sound, steady glowing light very bright, white to white/gold color.
content.summary: See detailed descrition

content.detailedDescription: Daughter (age 12) witnessed event. she was standing outside in back yard of residential neighborhood for quite a while at sunset (her eyes were adjusted to ambient light). her attention was drawn to the western sky by some especially rapidly moving white clouds. she saw a black, somewhat bumpy, spherical object with a steady glowing orange light moving in an arc. first thought: ufo! then immediately afterward, thought it was actually a meteor about to hit the house. ran to front yard, while shouting "look out!" lost sight of object. ran back to the back yard (west) and saw an identical object traversing the same path. ran to front yard (which faces east), saw both objects together at treetop level. both objects continued to ascend together at constant speed at a slightly upward slant. she watched until they disappeared from view, then ran in to tell me. she thought she may have seen whirling blades, but is not sure about that. witness is objective, interested in science, math, and physics and is not inclined to hysterics and does not lie. she does not read sci-fi, watch tv, or play computer games. she was extremely frightened by what she saw and concerned about a real danger of a collision from a physical object. she has perfect vision, does not wear glasses or anything. wants it to be explainable as a toy or hobby remote control craft.
content.summary: Black sphere with orange light moving in arc like a meteor followed by another identical object on same path, then both meet then ascend together.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of april 7th, 2013, i was on our north facing porch looking up at the sky.  i noticed at about the 10 o'clock position in the sky, what appeared to be a satellite moving west to east.  upon further observation, i noticed that it was too big and bright to be a satellite.  i moved down off of the porch onto the yard.  i began looking for blinking lights signifying an airplane.  when i saw no blinking lights, i called my wife's phone for her and the kids to come out and view the object.  my youngest son answered my wife's phone and i told him to get oldest son and to come out right away.  we observed the object dim and then brighten at which point the oldest son began the 22 second video with his camera phone.  the object then became extremely bright to the point of burning our eyes and then dimmed a little.  i sent the youngest son in to get my wife to see.  before she could come outside, the object disappeared behind the trees going east.  my oldest son then climbed on the roof to get an unobstructed view as it proceeded toward the general vicinity of comanche peak nuclear power plant.  he climbed to the highest point of the roof holding onto our chimney.  the object brightened again as he was getting his phone out to video.  at this point, the object increased in speed and curved upward like a blade of a knife and then disappeared before he could catch another video.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky that moved from west to east

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I'm not sure how to decribe what i saw it kinda looked like the moon but redish orange and the moon was on the other side of me . it reminded me of the sun setting the path of it that is but i had just watched the sun set 2 hours before. when i first starting watching it it had the shape of a cerset moon. i went inside to plung in my camra and when i came back out i couldn't see it. 1 min later my son went out and came right back in and said he could see it again. by the time i got out there it looked like a full cicle black on the inside and redish orange on the outer ring which kinda made me think i was watching an eclispe. i was able to get a few pics before my camra died while it looked like a creset moon but i wasn't able to get one of the full cicle before i couldn't see it any longer. i lost sight of it it looked like it went down like the sun does at sunset. i have a love for the moon and am often taking shots of the stars and moon but i haven't and clue what it was that i and my 13 year old son seen. it was like nothing i have ever seen before!
content.summary: I'm not sure how to decribe what i saw it kinda looked like the moon but redish orange and the moon was on the other side of me . it reminded me of the sun setting the path of it that is but i had just watched the sun set 2 hours before.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling southwest on a main highway when a light in the sky caught my  attention.  this light was, at this time,directly in front of me. my first thought was that it was a very large falling star but quickly realized it was flying a straight path across the sky to the north. i also quickly realized it resembled nothing i had seen in the past such as a helicopter, weather balloon or airplane. it had no flashing or multicolored lights like you would see on an airplane or helicopter. i pulled over on the side of the rode trying to find my iphone which took me several seconds.  i finally found it and jumped out of the car.  by this time it was to the west. it was spherical and a dark orange in color.  the center of the sphere was a pale yellow or off-white color. by the time i got my phone on video mode, it was going behind a tree then vanished before i could reposition myself on the other side of the tree.  it must have turned toward the nw but seemed to have disappeared very quickly.  if it was an airplane, i should have been able to see the lights once i was on the right sight of the tree.  another witness had stopped to watch it down the road from me.  she was heading ne. she drove up to where i was parked and said, "did you just see that?"  we both were nervous and excited about what we had just witnessed. neither one of us had ever seen anything like it before and we are both over 40. we had the exact same perceptions re: color, speed, size, etc.  and both agreed it did not look like a typical aircraft of any kind. my video only captured it for a fraction of a second as it was going behind a tree.  in the video, it's the orange light that goes through the trees, not the bright white light above it.
content.summary: Large glowing orange ball or sphere of light traveling slow across western sky

content.detailedDescription:
1)i was at my residence, i was on the second floor, walking from one room to another.
2)& 4) i looked out one window towards the ne and saw five large red-orange orbs coming slowly towards the se. i went to another window and saw an additional orb "catching" up to the other five. they were not in a straight line but looked as if each was flying side by side. the last one was catching up to the others. i opened the window to listen for any noise to rule out any type of aircraft,there was none.
6)in then went down stairs and out the back door to watch from outside, the orbs were either covered by clouds or had gone behind the large pine trees in the back yard and out of sight. there still was no noise from a craft. there were no planes in the sky,as flights come over our area day and night enroute to large airports.
3)when i first saw them i knew that they were ufo's as i knew that they were not any aircraft. i know what a helicopter and aircraft front nose lights look like and their color, these looked like the front nose lights but were orange instead of white and larger.
5)i was excited to see them, we don't have sightings around here very often. i went into the living room and told my daughter and husband what i had seen and that the orbs were gone, otherwise, they could have come out and as witnesses. i was in a state of happiness, and glad to have finally seen craft(s), i have not seen any for many years. i slept really well, and had no issues from this incident.

however, i was upset that i couldn't have watched longer and that my family could not have seen them, i am sure of what i saw!
today, may 12th, 2013, my daughter called and she had been talking to some friends who had also seen the orbs but they were more upset at seeing them. i think they were scared because we just don't have sightings here. i can get their names although i do not know them, if it is necessary. personally, it was interesting and exciting (not in a scary way) but knowing "they"/beings exist and are showing themselves more and more throughout the world, is exciting!

no pictures were taken the time was too short, should they reappear, i will try to get pictures.
content.summary: Saw 6 glowing orange orbs coming from the ne going toward se

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the north side porch looking at the sky.  i noticed an object in the western sky at about 10 o'clock that appeared to be a satellite.  after watching for a moment, i moved to the yard and the object began to brighten. i realized that it was not a satellite because the object was not only larger than a satellite, but a lot brighter. i then began to look for blinking lights of an aircraft thinking that it could be a plane.  after further observation, there were no blinking lights.  i called my wife's phone, who was inside the house, to come and see.  my younger son answered her phone.  i told him to come outside quick to see this.  he and my oldest son ran outside to see.  we all witnessed the craft dim to the point that it looked as if it could be a satellite except for it's larger size.  my oldest son pulled out his phone and started the 22 second video.  we were witnessing it get so bright white that it burned our eyes; we saw spots afterwards.  it began to dim a little as it went behind trees. i sent my youngest son in to get my wife and my oldest son climbed up onto the roof to get a better, unobstructed view.  

now my oldest son's observation from the roof was that it was dim again. he reached to get his phone to get another video, but the object got extremely bright and went straight over to the east and gradually curved up like the blade of a knife and after a couple seconds, it disappeared.  he wasn't able to get a second video before it was gone.
content.summary: Noticed what first appeared to be a satellite moving west to east

content.detailedDescription: My father and i first witnessed odd objects in the night sky at poteau river site 13 lake hinkle dam (just southwest of waldron, arkansas) in the late 1990s on a night fishing trip. last month, we decided to go back and see what we could see, since i just purchased a very nice dslr camera, tripod, wide-angle lense and large sd card. we wanted to capture something on film. so, i took my dad and two oldest sisters out for a few hours of photography. at the very least, there is little light polution out there, and i would hopefully capture nice star pictures. after not seeing anything, and taking 196 time-elapse photos of fifteen seconds per, i got home and began looking at the pictures. something looked like an odd streak, and so it caught my eye and i brightened the image and saw a lot more. if you have an address for me to send this photo (either the nef raw image, the un-edited jpeg image or the brightened jpeg image), please let me know. i cannot explain this. i have seen planes, satellites, the iss, meteors, and various birds, but nothing can account for the luminescence captured since there was very little light where we were at, the random patterns captured, the lack of any noise made, the fact that they only occurred in one of the almost 200 photos, or the fact that none of us saw these things. my camera is a nikon d5200, shoots 24.1 mpxl pictures, tamron 17-50 mm xr di ii vc lense, iso 1250, f/2.8, 15 second exposure, tripod was in use, star pattern is established, no editing to either jpeg or nef raw image, except i did brighten and "save as" a jpeg image to see more detail. if anyone would like to see it, the brightened one is about a ten megabyte file as a jpeg. just let me know where to send it and which one you want. you have my word of honor this is not a trick, hoax, photo-editing magic or anything of that sort. this is as i captured it. thanks.
content.summary: Found these images from time-elapse photos of stars. only one had them out of 196 pictures. cannot explain what they are!

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside facing east, and witnessed a glowing orb shape in the sky. it came up passed the treeline, stopped, and formed a diamond shape. it circled back around behind the trees after its formation. it had a greenish tint, but a prominent white glow. i basically stared at the object and observed it making an elongated diamond formation. my first reaction was that of surprise, but then i felt excited that i got to see something like this. next, confused. then, reluctant to go to sleep.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Greenish glowing object ascended over treeline, formed a diamond shape, then circled back around to previous flight path

content.detailedDescription: I was on north newport blvd,at the corner of broadway st,in newport beach,at a stop light. i was heading for the 55 north freeway. i saw a black triangle. the black triangle was descending, in a straight path,at the same speed than a normal plane would.  from where i was sitting in my car, it was descending to my left. the whole event lasted only about 4-5 seconds, and then it disappeared,because the building triangle square, was blocking it from my view.
content.summary: Black triangle, descending, going towards the ocean-side.

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work. star like object very bright headed nw then curved to ne direction. plane located about 5 miles north of this objects location. location near addison/devils lake michigan area. as soon as direction changed object light or reflective light no longer could be seen.
content.summary: Looked about 2x brighter than international space station does. object headed nw curved to the ne. plane located to the north of it.

content.detailedDescription: I would write it out but i don't want to be killed!
content.summary: New type of contact

content.detailedDescription:
Standing outside, facing south. having a discussion with a friend i had not seen in awhile.  noticed light at about 45 degrees above the horizon.  weather conditions were cool and damp, full cloud cover.  

visible was only fire.  my first reaction was one of fear- that perhaps there was an aircraft on fire.  this was very obviously fire, but then i realized it wasn't moving.  the intensity of the brightness varied some- but not a lot at first.  the object stood stationary for several seconds to a minute, then moved, and paused again.  this occurred several times over the course of about five minutes, and then the object faded to the point that it was no longer visible. 

this was witnessed by several other people.  the object appeared as a fireball, and there was no audible noise, and it was dark outside so nothing was visible around the object.  

it was very interesting, and i wish that i could have captured it on video, it would have been great to see it for longer, and hopefully it will be seen again someday!
content.summary: Fire.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard by the pool, probably smoking. it was mostly sunny with a a few clouds, when i saw a shiny object moving at a rate of speed no plane could match. it was at about 19 to 20 thousand feet.? it was high enough that i couldn't make out a distinct shape. closest i could come is saucer shape or something like it. . i thought it was a plane at first. but i have never seen any plane travel at that kind of speed and have never seen any plane reflect that much light off of it. this object went into a small cloud and didn't pass through. i should have been able to see him come out, which would have took less than a second as fast as it was going. not sure what i saw, but i don't think it was any kind of plane
content.summary: I observed a bright shiny object moving at extremely high rate of speed, that disappeared into a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: Taking photographs of cloudy sky and captured anomaly.
content.summary: Found in photo after taking it.  unseen while photographing.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home when a friend called me to take out my binoculars to see a strange object in the sky. i thought it was more convenient to take my camera nikon coolpix p100 and reach the scene immediately. i realized that the object was producing reflections from sunlight and i guess was due to the material of the object surface. just locate the eye achieves fails to know that as i had but seemed to be moving slowly. active my camera and place it fails to take a branch of a tree reference and reach him. set the maximum zoom to and after several attempts to achieve some are quite sharp and also some short videos. finally the object is moved at high speed in a straight line and all witnesses were out of sight.
content.summary: Flying object in the sky was moving slowly as conducting reconnaissance, finally moved at high speed and lost sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was stood in the rear garden of my house which a gable end house of a terrace at around 10.30 pm observing the sky which i do on a regular basis..It was very clear night no cloud at all...A slight breeze but nothing that noticeable......I have seen high altitude objects before but have never been 100% that they weren't satellites or the i.S.S.....But this time...This was different....These objects were bigger than usual...I noticed the objects because im always out looking at the sky on good clear nights...The first object i saw was high altitude it was arcing it's trajectory and pulsating  100% it wasn't a plane...No flashing lights , no sound....I live on a flight path for manchester airport ...I know what planes look like...This was no plane, judging by the height this thing was at it must of been a large object...I watched it cross the sky and out of sight...I continued to watch hoping to see more...I wasn't disappointed...About a minute or 2 later ...Another one...Exactly the same...High altitude..Pulsating...Exact same trajectory across the sky....Both moving quite quickly aswell but long enough for me to watch them move across the sky for gotta be close to a minute or so....Another minute or so after the 2nd high altitude one disappears out of sight...Bammm...2 orangey/reddish coloured balls of light just appear out of thin air over the tops of the houses behind mine....I was facing north and they appeared to the right hand side to me .......2 separate craft...I would say roughly around 20 or so feet above the rooftops...Could of even been less...But i can tell you it was close!!...They were side by side with only a few feet between them....They arced there trajectory and shot around past me from the east over my head ..They then flew west at speed and were moving in sort of a rollercoaster style movement..They then began to twist around each other in sort of a double helix ...Then straight forwards again side by side but moving away from each other outwards...Then back in ..Then back out...In again..Out...They kept doing this until they flew over the rooftops of the houses in front of mine which are a couple of hundred yards away....It didnt take long for them to go out of sight...I only witnessed these  2 craft for what only seemed like about 20 seconds or so....But seconds that will be permanently engrained in my memory for the rest of my life i can assure you.....But thats not the end....Only a minute or so after the 2 glowing orb type craft i saw another high altitude craft doing exactly the same as the other 2 high altitude craft ...Pulsating...Same trajectory..Etc.....All of these "objects" that i saw all with no sound...I would love to know if anyone else saw it.... completely blown my mind!!! ....And i consider myself a bit of a researcher on ufology and the like...Iv been awake for roughly 8 years or so..Iv recently become more concious and spiritually minded ...Whether that has anything to do with what i witnessed ...Who knows...I dont know maybe im putting out that vibration and energy that i want to experience these things or that i am open to them in a positive way....I dunno..But this was just simply awesome!!....Like i said iv seen things before but never 100% certain on what i saw...But this was the real deal....No doubt what so ever in my mind!!!! anyway ..I dont know even know if anyone will read this...I hope so...I just thought it needed to be reported in case anyone has had similar experiences or could use the info...Btw unfortunately i didnt get chance to film anything....My mobile phone isn't the best and way to shabby to catch the high altitude objects ...And the 2 orbs were just way to quick for me too react...And to be honest i was just way too gobsmacked to think about reaching into my pocket!! sorry about that!! :) ..Hope this is useful to someone :)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 high altitude objects and also 2 reddish / orange balls of light low altitude observed

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1981 or '82 i was 11 or 12 years old. we had a relative from germany visiting, who was lets say was a "higher up" over there.  he slept in my room so i was moved in my twin brothers room to sleep, he of course wouldn't give me the bed so i was to sleep on the floor. well i couldn't sleep. so i got up at i'm guessing around 2am to look out the window to quell my boredom. my view of the sky was obstructed due to the over hang of our house and the neighbors roof. the space machine came soon after i went to the window, within 30 seconds. it came over the neighbors house towards our house and over it heading north. it was massive in size! it moved slowly and silently. it was the size and shape of a football stadium. i only saw the belly of the machine, the lights are still to this day undecidable. the entire thing was lite up and also had intricate lighting shades the same color detailing "instruments", to say it was neon lighting does it no justice. but that is the closest i can come to describing it. the absolute beauty of this machine was amazing. it simply glided over the house and i assume continued on it path north. i was fixed on looking at the object so i don't know if the ground was lite up. i was not scared at all, i was in complete awww, i new it was not from this planet. i told no one, not even my brother for years, back then you just didn't talk about stuff like that. i will always regret not doing more at the time but i was just a kid. i did also check my self at the time to insure i was not dreaming. i did thou do my own interrogation the next day of our company but i found out nothing. i will disclose every thing if i am asked. it's time the truth comes out of what and who is really out there. thank you, laura
content.summary: Massive in size, lights covered entire belly, with darker detail around intricate(parts)

content.detailedDescription: Stopped to get food and an older gentleman was standing staring off in the distance shouting "what is that! what are those!!!" about 7 orange glowing orbs observed moving across the sky rising at a 45 degree angle, all in various positions not relating to each other. they were going higher and farther away. they were dim and seemed to flicker at the distance i guessed to be 5 miles away. some of them floated close to each other and then there appeared to be only one. i looked around some trees blocking my view and observed 4 or 5 more taking off in 1 second intervals from the ground at a 45 degree angle in the direction of the other ones. the event was happening over near the chandler airport.
content.summary: 10 + glowing orange orbs taking off seperately in the vicinity of chandler airport

content.detailedDescription: They might have been chinese lanterns but the flight path was a little strange for something like that. my girlfriend called me whilew she was driving home and told me to look up because there was 2 orange lights in the sky. i got excited and went out back to look but i couldnt see them. she tried to tell me where to look but it wasnt working. i couldnt find them. she was only a few blocks away so i ran out fron so she could pick me up and i could see them. she had already taken a few pictures on her phone and so were alot of other people who were driving next to her. after she picked me up she turned 1 corner and bam! lights in the sky right in front of me.  the 2 lower ones were hovereing and kind of moving side to side next to each other while the rest of them were motionless. 1 of them descended to almost to the horizon and then ascended again. we stopped a couple blocks after she picked me up to get a few more pictures. at this time several people were in there fron yards looking at the lights. 1 lady asked what they werew and i said they look like ufos. and she said thats what she was thinking. we drove in there direction to get a better look and then another one appeared a little lower than them. after a few blocks they started dissapearing so we stopped to look again. at this time there was only 1 left and it kind of drifted up and dissapeared. the kinda looked like they were drifitin like baloons or lanterns at this point. but when i first saw them they were in a formation and not moving except for the 2 lowere ones. the light was flickerin like fire which made me think of the chinese lanterns. so i dont koow what we saw but it was really neat!!!!
content.summary: 6 to 10 bright orange orbs. 2 were traveling east to west while the otthers hovered. 1 desended to almost the horizon the ascended again. possibly chinese lanterns?

content.detailedDescription: Was not going to report it because husband did not want me to. was seen thru a telescope by three other witneses too. it was a pulsating starlike with dark center with red to green auras. seem to pulsate large to small.
content.summary: Same report as case no 47357

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting out side at forrest city, sd. about a mile or two from where i live. across the bridge on the reservation. i was singing some songs, waiting for bites, watching the sky. i could determine some stars from planets, and constellations. i seen a few airplanes going by really really high. i seen on the river a reflection of purple. it was a dark, royal purple. it wasn't very bright on the water, but i could see it. at first i didn't know what to think. maybe could be something floating in the water. then i noticed it was just a reflection somehow purple in that spot just like how the moon light reflects off the water. a certain spot was purple. that was a bout a half mile away.

 i looked up w. - s.W. over the river towards the dark hilly horizon to my right, from where i was. i thought i seen something in the sky and im sure i did because it kept getting closer. it's dark out here and there were not any lights on the exterior of this craft. i could see through the windows it was like hover/flying/descending west of me heading n.E from where ever it came from. from where i was at. i noticed that it was a craft and who ever was controlling it was having difficulty with it. i landed in shallow water west of me on a slope. the front of the craft sideways and facing the water/slope.  then it pretty much vanished. it looked like it was moving forward into the water. maybe it was an accident, something obviously went wrong. i couldn't move. i stood there and watched this happen. by the time i realized it was gone, however, i started to head up to the land from the shore so i could travel easier to the site instead of going along the shore. by the time i got there about the length of two cigs. i saw two bean shaped pods come out of the water. they weren't just shaped like beans. that was just the shape of the cockpit of each craft. which seemed reasonably aerodynamic. i figured they came from the craft that just submerged 10 minutes prior. they hovered out of the water. the crafts faced me in moonlit darkness, and about faced and took off. i watched them fade into the distance toward the south. i went back to my fishing spot and started to pack up. on my way home i was driving up the hill on the other side of the bridge and as soon as i got to the top i seen a purple looking star and then it made itself into a line. it went from the south direction in the sky i was driving almost straight, yet a little left  - into space. i don't remember getting home which was only a mile away. i just remember that and then i woke up thinking of the whole event. then i went fishing again til around noon. today. same spot. couldn't see deep enough into the water to tell if main craft was still down there. there was obviously something in the water though. you could see sort of in the shale under water in the shallow something was there.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was fishing for sturgeon easy at night and seen a controlled crash and i ran to help out.
content.locationName: Forrest City or Eagle But, South Dakota

content.detailedDescription:
at 11:45 pm on the night of may 11, 2013 i went to my front porch and lit a cigarette. i noticed two bright points in the sky over the city of binghamton. these points of light were much brighter than anything i've seen in the sky. at first glance i thought the lights were airplanes flying away from me which gave them the appearance of floating. they steadily arose into the sky displaying a brilliant red color with a pulsing yellow to orange interior. i thought they could have been chinese lanterns, but as the first two objects drifted into the clouds, out of sight, two more lifted into the sky, and didn't take the same flight path. over the next 20 minutes my girlfriend and i witnessed a total of ten glowing objects rise and vanish into the nne to nnw. i felt a sense of surprise and wonder as i peered at the objects through the binoculars. my heart rate increased and i almost felt a sense panic also. since the sightings last night, i still feel a strong urge to find out what they were. i cant get them out of my head.
     thank you for taking the time to hear of my experience.
 
                                sincerely, 
                                 jason hodgson
content.summary: The objects lifted in pairs. each pair flew off in different directions within the nne to nnw ranges. brilliant red color with orange center.

content.detailedDescription:
at 11:45 pm on the night of may 11, 2013 i went to my front porch and lit a cigarette. i noticed two bright points in the sky over the city of binghamton. these points of light were much brighter than anything i've seen in the sky. at first glance i thought the lights were airplanes flying away from me which gave them the appearance of floating. they steadily arose into the sky displaying a brilliant red color with a pulsing yellow to orange interior. i thought they could have been chinese lanterns, but as the first two objects drifted into the clouds, out of sight, two more lifted into the sky, and didn't take the same flight path. over the next 20 minutes my girlfriend and i witnessed a total of ten glowing objects rise and vanish into the nne to nnw. i felt a sense of surprise and wonder as i peered at the objects through the binoculars. my heart rate increased and i almost felt a sense panic also. since the sightings last night, i still feel a strong urge to find out what they were. i cant get them out of my head.
     thank you for taking the time to hear of my experience.
 
                                sincerely, 
                                 jason hodgson
content.summary: The objects lifted in pairs. each pair flew off in different directions within the nne to nnw ranges. brilliant red color with orange center.

content.detailedDescription:
Husband out front of house having a smoke and look up at the sky and saw 8-9 strange white/yellow lights hovering in sky, he came in to get me and we went out with our 8 year old daughter, we thought it very weird, my daughter was scared...We took photos and video until the lights faded away 
video on youtube 'strange lights karingal'
content.summary: 8 -9 strange lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: In my room with roommate at 1:29 getting ready for bed, my roommate called me over to the window and we saw a orange light shaped like orbs moving north stop near our house high in the sky but still large enough to see.  it stopped above our neighborhood and split into five similar balls in a triangle formation.  we then got his brother and went outside.  the orbs rotated to face east and then moved off into the distance and out of sight.  we all were a little shaken by what we saw but non of us were freaking out. we then contacted a friend who lived close by and he saw the same exact thing and was able to get a picture.
content.summary: Orangeish light split into 5 lights in triganle formation moving east

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were walking through the woods at night. we were just looking in the sky and our friend pointed it out, out of nowhere. we thought it was an alien ufo ship or something. it was a black triangle shaped object and in the corner of  all three edges of the triangle was a bright white light and it appeared literally out of nowhere and then drifted to the side before it stopped in mid flight and started to hover. then its three triangular lights changed to one single bright white light then the one light disappeared. we were so scarred because we were in the middle of the woods and we started freaking out and yelling, it was terrifying. it just disappeared right in front of us!
content.summary: A black triangle with 3 lights emitting in a triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: As me and my friends were leaving a meeting. we were on montgomery traveling west and on the overpass about to get on i-25 going south. when i looked at the moon and saw a group of glowing orbs around the moon. i said, what the f@#$ is that. everyone in the car looked and was like wow. as we drove on the highway we noticed that they were stationary and closer than first appeared. they were about a mile away. small orbs like the size of a basketball and in the shape of the big dipper, except in an upside down position. i asked my friend to take a picture as we were driving south, but he could see them on his camera. it was busy on that overpass, and we know we weren't the only people to witness this event.
content.summary: Group of lights that hovered over north valley of alb. looked like phoenix light
